alert.note: Alert for Palm Beach (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued September 27 at 9:28PM EDT until September 27 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Central Palm Beach County in southeastern Florida... * Until 1000 PM EDT. * At 928 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Lion Country Safari Park, or near Wellington, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Wellington, Royal Palm Beach, Lion Country Safari Park, Loxahatchee Groves and The Acreage. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
